Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT

Title: Authorizes a tax abatement for alterations and improvements to multiple dwellings
Summary: Authorizes a tax abatement for alterations and improvements to multiple dwellings for purposes of preserving habitability in affordable housing.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to authorizing a tax abatement for alterations and improvements to multiple dwellings
